basic_info.title: Fix education section in policy index with correct anchor links

comments.body:

I'll be helping with this pull request! Here's what you should know:

- Look at CI failures and help fix them

Note: I can only respond to comments from users who have write access to this repository.

performed_via_github_app.name: Devin.ai Integration
performed_via_github_app.description: This Github App integration allows Devin (devin.ai) to have limited authenticated access to your organization's code repositories.

commit.message:
Update education section in policy index with correct anchor links

- Add all 6 sections for Step 1 education with user-specified URL-encoded anchors
- Add section 4 for Step 2 education with correct anchor link
- Update section titles to match actual policy file content
- Fix section ordering and numbering

Co-Authored-By: taishonishii@gmail.com <taishonishii@gmail.com>
